price: 10. Ou encore détiennent-ils la royauté des cieux, de la terre et de ce qu’il y a entre eux ! Qu’ils suivent donc les voies leur permettant d’y monter !
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُم مُّلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَاۖ فَلۡيَرۡتَقُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَسۡبَٰبِ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: am lahum mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā falyartaqū fī al-asbābi
